feed.title: Planka Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Planka: v1.25.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Update German translation (#1049)
  • fix: Update Swedish translation (#1054)
  • fix: Update Russian translation (#1056)
  • fix: Update Korean translation (#1060)

New Contributors

  • @Leif-n made their first contribution in https://github.com/plankanban/planka/pull/1054

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plankanban/planka/compare/v1.25.0...v1.25.1

entry.title: New release for Planka: planka-0.2.23
entry.content: A Helm chart to deploy Planka and it's dependencies.

entry.title: New release for Planka: v1.26.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Ability to automatically initiate OIDC authentication (#1092)
  • fix: Update French translation (#1068)
  • docs: Add link to postman api (#1077)

New Contributors

  • @grenagit made their first contribution in https://github.com/plankanban/planka/pull/1068
  • @tomsilva made their first contribution in https://github.com/plankanban/planka/pull/1077
  • @luzzardik made their first contribution in https://github.com/plankanban/planka/pull/1092

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plankanban/planka/compare/v1.25.1...v1.26.0
